mapper.select: SELECT P.PRODUCTNO, P_PRICE, P_CDATETIME, P_UDATETIME, P_NAME, P_CONTENT, P_KIND, I_LIKE, C.NAME AS CATNAME, IMGSRC FROM mini_db2.T1_PRODUCT P LEFT OUTER JOIN mini_db2.T1_CODE C ON C.CODE = P.P_KIND LEFT OUTER JOIN mini_db2.T1_PDIMAGE PI ON P.PRODUCTNO = PI.PRODUCTNO WHERE P_KIND = #{pKind} LIMIT #{startNum}, #{lastNum}
SELECT * FROM mini_db2.T1_CODE WHERE KIND = 'CATEGORY' AND CODE != 'R'
